attributes.action: Ensure this petition site is run fairly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have set up the below petition but it appears that some of the respondents to the petition have not received their confirmation emails
Is this an error with the site or a controlling measure?

Ensure that this site is run fairly for all petitions even the ones the government may not like to see

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MP-salary/

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
